attributes.action:
All parties want the best for the NHS so have cross party consensus 
on the NHS
attributes.background: There is so much time taken up with arguing about the NHS.  All parties want the best for the NHS Surely it is in the country's best interest for there to  be cross party consensus/ on the NHS instead of the constant vitriol across the house

rejection.details: This is a matter for political parties and individuals, not the responsibility of the Government and Parliament as a whole.
